description: Dawn`s Quilava evolved from her Cyndaquil while in the forest near Professor Rowan`s laboratory. While chasing after the escaped Pok√©mon from Professor Rowan`s laboratory, a ton of Ariados used their String Shot to capture everyone and they could not break free. After Dawn`s Quilava had finished evolving, it was able to break free from the String Shot and was able to fight off the Ariados with Eruption which it had just learned.
name: Magmarashi (Hikari)
